name: Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet from new form submissions in Swipe Pages
description:
This template periodically checks for new form submissions in Swipe Pages and uses the retrieved information to create new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uGxqFgHHVLGud_Yxwf8U5TxPdX4L5YSCM3kjWzJ4-HM/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template expects your Swipe Pages form to collect at least the following information:
1) Email
2) First name
3) Last name

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
